annotate.database
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  annotate.database.Database
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object

Access to the underlying database (normally db4o).

In this version there is only one database file for all the data. However, due to performance issues this may have to be changed in the future.

Author:
jaschasilbermann
